mapper.delete: DELETE FROM `like` WHERE board_idx = #{board_idx} AND user_nick = #{user_nick}
mapper.select: SELECT board_idx, COUNT(*) as count FROM `like` WHERE board_idx = #{board_idx} GROUP BY board_idx
mapper.insert: insert into `like` ( like_idx, user_nick, board_idx, count, created_date ) values ( #{like_idx}, #{user_nick}, #{board_idx}, #{count}, sysdate() )
